enWisdom: The intellect is the excellence of human beings
Intellect is the best thing that is hoped for

Wisdom: عُنْوَانُ فَضِيلَةِ الْمَرْءِ عَقْلُهُ وَحُسْنُ خُلُقِهِ
enWisdom: The symbol of a person’s merit is his intelligence and good character
The highest of all merits is intelligence

Wisdom: لِلْإِنْسَانِ فَضِيلَتَانِ عَقْلٌ وَمَنْطِقٌ فَبِالْعَقْلِ يَسْتَفِيدُ وَبِالْمَنْطِقِ يُفِيدُ
enWisdom: The human being has two merits: intellect and speech; he derives benefit through his intellect and benefits others by his speech
Nothing embellishes virtues like the intellect

Wisdom: مَا قَسَمَ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ بَيْنَ عِبَادِهِ شَيْئاً أَفْضَلَ مِنَ الْعَقْلِ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, has not apportioned anything among his servants better than intellect
It is through the intellect that every affair is set aright
